channel.title: Is there a website that you can create those funny black boarder pictures?
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone knew of a website where you can submit a picture and it'll create those black boarder images where there's one word on the top, then a phrase at the bottom that describes the picture. I've wondered this for a while. I'm not sure what those type of pictures are actually called, if there's a specific name for it, but this is what I'm talking about.
[img]http://recruiter.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fail.jpg[/img]

item.title: Is there a website that you can create those funny black boarder pictures?

@TabbyKiller wrote:

microsoft word will do the trick.

item.title: Is there a website that you can create those funny black boarder pictures?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:6, topic:337205”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=433612.msg3184051#msg3184051 date=1271562286]

Well, it seems that the train going over the bridge must of broke it, so the bridge must of feel in on top of the one going under the bridge, because if you look you can see the bridge broken to the left, as well as the supports.

What…?

I told you how it happened. Isn’t that what you wanted?
[/quote]

No.[/quote]
Oh well that was the question on the picture O.o.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a website that you can create those funny black boarder pictures?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

krackkid:

Well, it seems that the train going over the bridge must of broke it, so the bridge must of feel in on top of the one going under the bridge, because if you look you can see the bridge broken to the left, as well as the supports.

What…?

sick sub1:

http://www.demotivationalpics.com/ try that just go to it and scroll down a bit and you should see demotivational generator. ;D

I’ll take a look at it tomorrow. I’m heading to a friend’s right now.
